bodydiv.p: This edition contains only Accounting Standards issued by the IASB as at 31 December 2023 that are required for accounting periods beginning on or after 1 January 2024 (that is, all Accounting Standards with an effective date on or before 1 January 2024).

Accounting Standards and amendments to Accounting Standards issued by 31 December 2023 with an effective date after 1 January 2024 are excluded from this edition and will be included in IFRS® Accounting Standards—Issued at 1 January 2024 and in The Annotated IFRS® Accounting Standards—Standards issued at 1 January 2024.
